The claim is based on a statement made b: Chris Christie during an interview with Brian Williams on NBC Nightly News.
The claim asserts that New Jersey is: 50th in return of our federal tax dollars," implying that the state receives less federal aid compared to other states.
The Tax Foundation: a business-backed group, conducted an analysis from 1981 to 2005 and found that in 17 of those 25 years, New Jersey ranked last in terms of the federal tax burden, receiving 70 cents or less for every dollar it sent to the federal government.
Although the Tax Foundation: s analysis is from 2005, other studies and research organizations, such as the Northeast-Midwest Institute, suggest that New Jersey still ranks near the bottom in terms of federal tax return.
